7:I[97367,["/_next/static/chunks/ff1a16fafef87110.js","/_next/static/chunks/d2be314c3ece3fbe.js"],"OutletBoundary"]
8:"$Sreact.suspense"
4:T2564,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Testing Guide</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Full Feature Testing with Multi-Registry Setup</h2>
Test all features of Docker Registry UI with a realistic multi-registry environment populated with real images.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Quick Setup</h2>
Download the required files and start testing in minutes:
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Step 1: Download Files</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Create a test directory
mkdir docker-registry-ui-test
cd docker-registry-ui-test
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Download multi-registry compose file</h1>
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VibhuviOiO/docker-registry-ui/refs/heads/main/docker/docker-compose-multi-registry.yml
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Download test image population script</h1>
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/VibhuviOiO/docker-registry-ui/refs/heads/main/docker/populate-test-images.sh
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Make script executable</h1>
chmod +x populate-test-images.sh
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Step 2: Start Multi-Registry Environment</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Start two registries and the UI
docker-compose -f docker-compose-multi-registry.yml up -d
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Wait for services to be ready (about 10 seconds)</h1>
sleep 10
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Step 3: Populate with Test Images</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Run the population script
./populate-test-images.sh
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">This will:</h1>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">- Pull popular images (alpine, nginx, redis, postgres, node, python, etc.)</h1>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">- Push them to both test registries</h1>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">- Create ~40+ images in Registry 1</h1>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">- Create ~10+ images in Registry 2</h1>
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">- Takes about 5-10 minutes depending on your internet speed</h1>
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Step 4: Access the UI</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Open in your browser
http://localhost:5003
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">What Gets Created</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Registry 1 (localhost:5001)</h3>

<strong class="text-gray-900">alpine</strong>: 3.18, 3.17, 3.16, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">nginx</strong>: 1.25, 1.24, 1.23, alpine, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">redis</strong>: 7.2, 7.0, 6.2, alpine, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">postgres</strong>: 16, 15, 14, 13, alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">node</strong>: 20, 18, 16, 20-alpine, 18-alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">python</strong>: 3.11, 3.10, 3.9, 3.11-slim, 3.10-alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">busybox</strong>: 1.36, 1.35, latest, musl
<strong class="text-gray-900">ubuntu</strong>: 22.04, 20.04, 18.04, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">mysql</strong>: 8.0, 5.7, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">mongo</strong>: 7.0, 6.0, 5.0, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">myapp/service-1,2,3</strong>: v1.0.0, v1.1.0, latest
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Registry 2 (localhost:5002)</h3>

<strong class="text-gray-900">alpine</strong>: 3.18, latest
<strong class="text-gray-900">nginx</strong>: 1.25, alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">redis</strong>: 7.2, alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">postgres</strong>: 16, alpine
<strong class="text-gray-900">node</strong>: 20, 20-alpine
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Features to Test</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">1. Multi-Registry Management</h3>

Switch between Registry 1 and Registry 2 using dropdown
View different image sets in each registry
Configure registry settings
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">2. Repository Browsing</h3>

Browse all repositories
Search for specific repositories
View repository details and statistics
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">3. Tag Management</h3>

View all tags for each repository
See tag sizes and creation dates
View layer information
Delete individual tags
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">4. Vulnerability Scanning</h3>

Scan any image tag for vulnerabilities
View CVE details with severity levels
Filter vulnerabilities by severity
See which layer introduced each vulnerability
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">5. Bulk Operations</h3>

Delete multiple tags by pattern (e.g., <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono"><em>-alpine</code>)
Age-based cleanup (e.g., older than 30 days)
Retention policies (keep last N tags)
Dry run mode to preview deletions
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">6. Analytics</h3>

View storage usage by repository
See tag distribution
Analyze disk usage patterns
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Test Scenarios</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Scenario 1: Clean Up Old Alpine Versions</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">1. Navigate to Bulk Operations
2. Repository pattern: alpine
3. Tag pattern: 3.</em>
4. Keep minimum: 2
5. Enable dry run
6. Review what would be deleted
7. Execute deletion
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Scenario 2: Scan for Vulnerabilities</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">1. Navigate to nginx repository
2. Click "Scan" on nginx:latest
3. Wait for scan to complete
4. View vulnerability badges
5. Click badge to see CVE details
6. Filter by severity (Critical, High)
7. Click CVE ID to view in NVD
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Scenario 3: Layer Inspection</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">1. Navigate to postgres repository
2. Click on postgres:16 tag
3. Click "View Layers"
4. See layer sizes and commands
5. View vulnerability counts per layer
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Cleanup</h2>
When done testing, clean up everything:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Stop and remove all containers
docker-compose -f docker-compose-multi-registry.yml down -v
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Remove downloaded images (optional)</h1>
docker image prune -a
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Troubleshooting</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Script Fails to Pull Images</h3>

Check internet connectivity
Verify Docker Hub is accessible
Try running script again (it will skip already pulled images)
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">UI Not Accessible</h3>

Check if containers are running: <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker ps</code>
Check logs: <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker-compose logs registry-ui</code>
Verify port 5003 is not in use
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Registries Not Showing Images</h3>

Ensure populate script completed successfully
Check registry logs: <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker-compose logs registry-1</code>
Verify images were pushed: <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">curl http://localhost:5001/v2/_catalog</code>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Advanced Testing</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Custom Test Images</h3>
Add your own test images:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Tag and push custom image
docker tag myapp:latest localhost:5001/myapp:v1.0.0
docker push localhost:5001/myapp:v1.0.0
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Test with Authentication</h3>
Modify docker-compose-multi-registry.yml to add basic auth to registries and test authentication flow.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Automated Testing</h2>
<strong class="text-gray-900">Note:</strong> This project currently does not have automated test coverage. Contributions for unit and integration tests are welcome!0:{"buildId":"JcHhdlBJ6EkAu5YRxGD7t","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$L2",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L3",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"‚Üê Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Testing Guide"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Testing Guide for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$4"}}]]}]]}]}]]}],["$L5"],"$L6"]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}
